title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H2 - Jul 30 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H2 - Jul 30 2022
description:
In liberal American cities, repeat criminals go free to kill. A majority of murders since 2015 were committed by suspects who should have been in prison. New York City teen released from custody after brawling with police on subway platform in bloody viral video shown on ClayAndBuck.com. Clay says if a criminal hits a police officer, they should go to jail for at least one year. Washington Post opinion page: Quit, Joe, Quit! Biden could save the midterms with a one-term pledge. Who can the Democrats run in 2024? Is Buck Sexton the model for the Jack Ryan series? At 55 years old, how is Jeff Bezos so ripped?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
